enhanced_by.reason: The toString method relies on the options added to the group, which are managed by the addOption method.
The selected option may influence the string representation, so setting the selected option should be tested before invoking toString.
The toString method iterates over the options returned by getOptions, so assertions can be based on the output of getOptions.
The selected option is included in the string representation, so assertions can be based on the output of getSelected.
